kind.description: The kind of the Elastic resource - observability, security, search etc.

identity.description: Identity properties of the monitor resource.

location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

systemData.description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

provisioningState.description: Provisioning state of the monitor resource.

monitoringStatus.description: Flag specifying if the resource monitoring is enabled or disabled.

planDetails.description: Plan details of the monitor resource.

version.description: Version of elastic of the monitor resource

subscriptionState.description: State of the Azure Subscription containing the monitor resource

saaSAzureSubscriptionStatus.description: Status of Azure Subscription where Marketplace SaaS is located.

sourceCampaignId.description: A unique identifier associated with the campaign.

generateApiKey.description: Flag to determine if User API Key has to be generated and shared.

hostingType.description: Hosting type of the monitor resource - either Hosted deployments OR Serverless Projects.

projectDetails.description: Project details of the monitor resource IF it belongs to Serverless offer kind.

elasticCloudUser.description: Details of the user's elastic account.

elasticCloudDeployment.description: Details of the elastic cloud deployment.

emailAddress.description: Email of the Elastic User Account.

id.description: User Id of the elastic account of the User.

elasticCloudSsoDefaultUrl.description: Elastic cloud default dashboard sso URL of the Elastic user account.

azureSubscriptionId.description: Associated Azure subscription Id for the elastic deployment.

elasticsearchRegion.description: Region where Deployment at Elastic side took place.

elasticsearchServiceUrl.description: Elasticsearch ingestion endpoint of the Elastic deployment.

kibanaServiceUrl.description: Kibana endpoint of the Elastic deployment.

kibanaSsoUrl.description: Kibana dashboard sso URL of the Elastic deployment.

emailAddress.description: Email of the user used by Elastic for contacting them if needed

companyInfo.description: Company information of the user to be passed to partners.

employeesNumber.description: Number of employees in the company

projectType.description: Project type; ex: Elasticsearch / Observability / Security

configurationType.description: Configuration type of the Elasticsearch project

createdBy.description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedAt.description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)

properties.description: The request to update subscriptions needed to be monitored by the Elastic monitor resource.

systemData.description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

operation.description: The operation for the patch on the resource.

monitoredSubscriptionList.description: List of subscriptions and the state of the monitoring.

error.description: The reason of not monitoring the subscription.

tagRules.description: Definition of the properties for a TagRules resource.

provisioningState.description: Provisioning state of the monitoring tag rules.

sendAadLogs.description: Flag specifying if AAD logs should be sent for the Monitor resource.

sendSubscriptionLogs.description: Flag specifying if subscription logs should be sent for the Monitor resource.

sendActivityLogs.description: Flag specifying if activity logs from Azure resources should be sent for the Monitor resource.

filteringTags.description: List of filtering tags to be used for capturing logs. This only takes effect if SendActivityLogs flag is enabled. If empty, all resources will be captured. If only Exclude action is specified, the rules will apply to the list of all available resources. If Include actions are specified, the rules will only include resources with the associated tags.

name.description: The name (also known as the key) of the tag.

action.description: Valid actions for a filtering tag.

systemData.description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

openAIResourceId.description: The resource name of Open AI resource

openAIResourceEndpoint.description: The API endpoint for Open AI resource

openAIConnectorId.description: The connector id of Open AI resource

key.description: Value of API key for Open AI resource

lastRefreshAt.description: Last Update Timestamp for key updation

properties.description: Properties of the monitoring tag rules.

systemData.description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

planId.description: Newly selected plan Id to create the new Marketplace subscription for Resubscribe

term.description: Newly selected term to create the new Marketplace subscription for Resubscribe

subscriptionId.description: Newly selected Azure Subscription Id in which the new Marketplace subscription will be created for Resubscribe

resourceGroup.description: Newly selected Azure resource group in which the new Marketplace subscription will be created for Resubscribe

organizationId.description: Organization Id of the Elastic Organization that needs to be resubscribed

identity.description: Identity properties of the monitor resource.

location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

id.description: Fully qualified resource ID for the resource. E.g. "/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}"

type.description: The type of the resource. E.g. "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines" or "Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts"

userName.description: Username of the user to be created or updated

fullName.description: Full name of the user to be created or updated

password.description: Password of the user to be created or updated

emailId.description: Email id of the user to be created or updated

roles.description: Roles to be assigned for  created or updated user

created.description: Shows if user is created or updated

partnerBillingEntity.description: Partner Billing Entity details: Organization Info

marketplaceStatus.description: Marketplace Subscription Details: SaaS Subscription Status

billedAzureSubscriptionId.description: The Azure Subscription ID to which the Marketplace Subscription belongs and gets billed into.

subscribed.description: Flag specifying if the Marketplace status is subscribed or not.

id.description: Marketplace Subscription Id. This is a GUID-formatted string.

publisherId.description: Publisher Id of the Marketplace offer.

offerId.description: Offer Id of the Marketplace offer,

partnerEntityUri.description: Link to the elastic organization page

rulesets.description: List of elastic traffic filters in the account

source.description: IP of the elastic filter rule

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

azureResourceId.description: The azure resource Id of the resource.

type.description: The hosting type of the resource.

version.description: Version of the elasticsearch in Elastic cloud deployment.

memoryCapacity.description: RAM capacity of the elasticsearch in Elastic cloud deployment.

diskCapacity.description: Disk capacity of the elasticsearch in Elastic cloud deployment.

elasticsearchEndPoint.description: Elasticsearch endpoint in Elastic cloud deployment. This is either the aliased_endpoint if available, or the service_url otherwise.

reasonForLogsStatus.description: Reason for why the resource is sending logs (or why it is not sending).
